description: This file defines tools and configurations for Airflow DAGs, including importing modules, setting up an agent with Airflow tools, and embedding a sample DAG definition as a string.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that manages tools and interactions.

classes.name: AirflowTools
classes.description: A class providing tools for managing Airflow DAGs.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes a command or script, in this case saving a DAG file.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response or message, here used to read the contents of the DAG file.
